name: Last Flash
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:

After what happened to flash in 2020, flash has been sent to a prison. Like Riddle School, use arrows and objects to escape.

BEHIND THE SCREEN:

I always wanted to make a game, it was one thing on my list of things to do and when I first heard flash was coming to its end-of-life, I thought it meant it wouldn't be updated, but now I know the real meaning, I got really upset.

My plan was to make a flash game and upload it to newgrounds, but exporting was a problem. So I decided to keep it HTML and upload it to itch.io instead.
